body_html:
Hi,

No problem.

OS Platform and Distribution:

  • all platforms and distrubutions

Tensorflow installed from:

  • source

Tensorflow version:

  • master branch of repo

Bazel version:

  • unknown / not relevent

CUDA/cuDNN version:

  • none

GPU model and memory:

  • none

Exact command to reproduce:

  • bazel test --test_env TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL=1 --verbose_failures --test_output=all --nocache_test_results --config=opt tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests:reshape_test_poplar

this only works if you have the Graphcore extensions which you will not. see issue on the XLA dev board.

body:
Hi,

No problem.

OS Platform and Distribution:
- all platforms and distrubutions

Tensorflow installed from:
- source

Tensorflow version:
- master branch of repo

Bazel version:
- unknown / not relevent

CUDA/cuDNN version:
- none

GPU model and memory:
- none

Exact command to reproduce:
- bazel test --test_env TF_CPP_MIN_VLOG_LEVEL=1  --verbose_failures --test_output=all --nocache_test_results --config=opt tensorflow/compiler/xla/tests:reshape_test_poplar

this only works if you have the Graphcore extensions which you will not.  see issue on the XLA dev board.
